mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item (item_id, cate_id, prov_id, item_title, item_price, item_stock, item_detail) VALUES (#{item_id}, #{cate_id}, #{prov_id}, #{item_title}, #{item_price}, #{item_stock}, #{item_detail})
mapper.select: SELECT item_id, c.cate_name, p.prov_name, item_title, item_price, item_stock, item_detail, item_regdate FROM item i, category c, provider p WHERE i.cate_id = c.cate_id AND i.prov_id = p.prov_id AND item_id = #{item_id}

SELECT item_id, c.cate_name, p.prov_name, item_title, item_price, item_stock, item_detail, item_regdate FROM item i, category c, provider p WHERE i.cate_id = c.cate_id AND i.prov_id = p.prov_id ORDER BY item_id DESC, item_regdate DESC
